mapper.select: SELECT m.id as music_id, m.title, m.url, m.singer, m.cover, u.id as user_id, u.name, u.email, u.phone_number, u.credits FROM t_music m LEFT JOIN t_like l ON m.id = l.music_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = l.user_id WHERE m.id IN ( SELECT music_id FROM t_like WHERE user_id = #{userId} )
